I downloaded a fragment of it to look at the quality, and from what I can see it looks good. No macro-blocks. I'll be happy to download the rest of it. Thank you, derek985. I've been wanting this one.

Format is NTSC 16x9 720x576 (movie is 2.35:1 AR). It was ripped/compressed 20% with AnyDVD & CloneDVD to fit on a standard DVD5 disc. It includes all menus, all english dolby audio streams, all, english subtitles, and all extras. After ripping I watched the entire movie & there were no quality or sound issues.

Thanks derek985!

ok, i had a problem with this.  

I don't know ho to go about making a DVD out of this, so I notmally just find the individual files for the movie and watch them in VLC player, one by one.  But when I do this, the second 2 files of the main movie - VTS_05_3 and VTS_05_4 - play with the voice over on them.  I can't figure out how to stop this.

How should I get round this?

Great movie so far...
ok... i found an answer.  in vlc player, go to audio, change audio track, and select track 2...
